regen.absent_element: notification or alert for invalid data
regen.new_specification: The system shall notify users of validation errors and provide alerts for invalid data during batch mode single or cross field validation.

regen.absent_element: notification for invalid data during input
regen.new_specification: The system shall notify users of invalid data during input based on configured validation rules.

regen.absent_element: warning or notification for invalid data during input
regen.new_specification: The system shall alert users of invalid data during input based on configured validation rules.

label: Configuring data validation rules shall be a privileged operation.
absence: action of granting privilege to configuring data validation rules
